subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}} # [[shuttle]] of a [[loom]] #* {{zh-x|^昔 ^孟母，擇 鄰 處，子 不 學，斷 機杼。|Of old, the mother of [[Mencius]]
chose a neighbourhood;
and when her child would not learn,
she broke the '''shuttle from the loom'''.|ref=Sanzijing}} # [[narrow]] # [[long]]-[[head]]ed # a [[scrub oak]] # [[thin]]

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|別出機杼|機杼一家|投杼|投杼之惑|投杼市虎|投杼之疑|機杼|獨出機杼|杼軸其空|杼軸|曾母投杼|自出機杼|杼𡳞}}
